016package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel;
017
018import android.app.Activity;
019import android.content.Context;
020import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
021import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
022import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
023import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
024import androidx.navigation.NavController;
025import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
026import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service.PermissionsRepository;
028import java.util.Set;
029import javax.inject.Inject;
030
031/**
032 * Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the current permissions
033 * state&mdash;that is, to the set of permissions which have been granted by the user. Additionally,
034 * the {@link #startPermissionsCheck(Activity, NavController)},
035 * {@link #requestPermissions(Activity, String[])}, and
036 * {@link #handlePermissionsRequestResult(int, String[], int[])} methods are provided to offload the
037 * permissions flow from the UI controller.
038 */
039@HiltViewModel
040public class PermissionsViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
041
042  private final PermissionsRepository repository;
043
044  @Inject
045  PermissionsViewModel(@SuppressWarnings("unused") @ApplicationContext Context context,
046      PermissionsRepository repository) {
047    this.repository = repository;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Returns {@link LiveData} containing the permissions granted, presumably for observation by a UI
052   * controller or bound {@link android.view.View}.
053   */
054  public LiveData<Set<String>> getPermissions() {
055    return repository.getPermissions();
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Initiates the permissions flow on behalf of a UI controller. <strong>This method is not
060   * thread-safe!</strong> As a rule, it should only be invoked from a single {@link Activity} in
061   * the app, and only on the main (UI) thread.
062   *
063   * @param activity      {@link Activity} initiating the flow and providing the
064   *                      {@link Activity#onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[])}
065   *                      callback.
066   * @param navController {@link NavController} used if/when navigating to the {@link
067   *                      edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.controller.PermissionsExplanationFragment}.
068   */
069  public void startPermissionsCheck(Activity activity, NavController navController) {
070    repository.startPermissionsCheck(activity, navController);
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Continues the permissions flow, after permission rationales have been acknowledged by the user.
075   *
076   * @param activity      {@link Activity} providing the {@link
077   *                      Activity#onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[])} callback.
078   * @param permissions   Permissions to be requested of the user.
079   */
080  public void requestPermissions(Activity activity, String[] permissions) {
081    repository.requestPermissions(activity, permissions);
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Handles response passed (indirectly) from
086   * {@link Activity#onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[])}, adding all granted
087   * permissions to a {@link LiveData LiveData&lt;Set&lt;String&gt;&gt;}.
088   *
089   * @param requestCode          Request code received by
090   *                             {@link Activity#onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[])},
091   *                             which must match a private constant in this class.
092   * @param permissionsRequested {@link String String[]} containing all permissions requested of the
093   *                             user by last invocation of
094   *                             {@link #requestPermissions(Activity, String[])}
095   * @param grantResults         {@code int[]} of grant/deny results.
096   * @return {@code true} if {@code requestCode} matched the expected value and results were
097   * processed; {@code false} otherwise.
098   */
099  public boolean handlePermissionsRequestResult(
100      int requestCode, @NonNull String[] permissionsRequested, @NonNull int[] grantResults) {
101    return repository.handlePermissionsRequestResult(
102        requestCode, permissionsRequested, grantResults);
103  }
104
105}
